entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 12 except 7 along parts of the coast. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle early in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning.
